00011 // bilerp.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "texture.h"
00014 #include "paramset.h"
00015 // BilerpTexture Declarations
00016 template <class T>
00017 class BilerpTexture : public Texture<T> {
00018 public:
00019         // BilerpTexture Public Methods
00020         BilerpTexture(TextureMapping2D *m,
00021                                   const T &t00, const T &t01,
00022                               const T &t10, const T &t11) {
00023                 mapping = m;
00024                 v00 = t00;
00025                 v01 = t01;
00026                 v10 = t10;
00027                 v11 = t11;
00028         }
00029         ~BilerpTexture() {
00030                 delete mapping;
00031         }
00032         T Evaluate(const DifferentialGeometry &dg) const {
00033                 float s, t, dsdx, dtdx, dsdy, dtdy;
00034                 mapping->Map(dg, &s, &t, &dsdx, &dtdx, &dsdy, &dtdy);
00035                 return (1-s)*(1-t) * v00 +
00036                        (1-s)*(  t) * v01 +
00037                            (  s)*(1-t) * v10 +
00038                            (  s)*(  t) * v11;
00039         }
00040 private:
00041         // BilerpTexture Private Data
00042         TextureMapping2D *mapping;
00043         T v00, v01, v10, v11;
00044 };
00045 // BilerpTexture Method Definitions
00046 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Texture<float> * CreateFloatTexture(const Transform &tex2world,
00047                 const TextureParams &tp) {
00048         // Initialize 2D texture mapping _map_ from _tp_
00049         TextureMapping2D *map = NULL;
00050         string type = tp.FindString("mapping");
00051         if (type == "" || type == "uv") {
00052                 float su = tp.FindFloat("uscale", 1.);
00053                 float sv = tp.FindFloat("vscale", 1.);
00054                 float du = tp.FindFloat("udelta", 0.);
00055                 float dv = tp.FindFloat("vdelta", 0.);
00056                 map = new UVMapping2D(su, sv, du, dv);
00057         }
00058         else if (type == "spherical") map = new SphericalMapping2D(tex2world.GetInverse());
00059         else if (type == "cylindrical") map = new CylindricalMapping2D(tex2world.GetInverse());
00060         else if (type == "planar")
00061                 map = new PlanarMapping2D(tp.FindVector("v1", Vector(1,0,0)),
00062                         tp.FindVector("v2", Vector(0,1,0)),
00063                         tp.FindFloat("udelta", 0.f), tp.FindFloat("vdelta", 0.f));
00064         else {
00065                 Error("2D texture mapping \"%s\" unknown", type.c_str());
00066                 map = new UVMapping2D;
00067         }
00068         return new BilerpTexture<float>(map,
00069                 tp.FindFloat("v00", 0.f), tp.FindFloat("v01", 1.f),
00070                 tp.FindFloat("v10", 0.f), tp.FindFloat("v11", 1.f));
00071 }
00072 
00073 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Texture<Spectrum> * CreateSpectrumTexture(const Transform &tex2world,
00074                 const TextureParams &tp) {
00075         // Initialize 2D texture mapping _map_ from _tp_
00076         TextureMapping2D *map = NULL;
00077         string type = tp.FindString("mapping");
00078         if (type == "" || type == "uv") {
00079                 float su = tp.FindFloat("uscale", 1.);
00080                 float sv = tp.FindFloat("vscale", 1.);
00081                 float du = tp.FindFloat("udelta", 0.);
00082                 float dv = tp.FindFloat("vdelta", 0.);
00083                 map = new UVMapping2D(su, sv, du, dv);
00084         }
00085         else if (type == "spherical") map = new SphericalMapping2D(tex2world.GetInverse());
00086         else if (type == "cylindrical") map = new CylindricalMapping2D(tex2world.GetInverse());
00087         else if (type == "planar")
00088                 map = new PlanarMapping2D(tp.FindVector("v1", Vector(1,0,0)),
00089                         tp.FindVector("v2", Vector(0,1,0)),
00090                         tp.FindFloat("udelta", 0.f), tp.FindFloat("vdelta", 0.f));
00091         else {
00092                 Error("2D texture mapping \"%s\" unknown", type.c_str());
00093                 map = new UVMapping2D;
00094         }
00095         return new BilerpTexture<Spectrum>(map,
00096                 tp.FindSpectrum("v00", 0.f), tp.FindSpectrum("v01", 1.f),
00097                 tp.FindSpectrum("v10", 0.f), tp.FindSpectrum("v11", 1.f));
00098 }
